About Me

Let me tell you a few things ...

BIO

I grew up as an "Air Force Brat." I was born in France, lived in Ohio, Michigan, Taiwan and California. This experience taught me how to make friends and helped me become an outgoing individual. I enjoy playing sports, spending time with family and being with people.

Racewalkers Unite!

1997 - 2017

Annual Portland to Coast Race

Each summer in August, a relay race is held in Portland, Oregon. It is a 130 mile race of 400 teams the stretches from Portland to Seaside, Oregon. I have participated in this race. I love the competition and push myself to walk as fast as I can. My personal best is an average pace of 10:50 per mile for 4 miles.

Who are You?

All my Life!

Genealogical Research

As a young boy my mother shared with me stories about her parents and grandparents. My father was only able to say that he knew nothing about his father, because he was dead. This sparked an interest in finding out more about my heritage. Aftermore than 30 years and a DNA test, I was able to find out who my grandfather was learn about my Irish ancestors. Page Title

Let's lend a Hand!

2010 - 2017

Board of Directors for Zarephath Ministries

I served on the Board of Directors for a non-profit food pantry and soup kitchen in Gresham, Oregon. It is an all volunteer organization with no consistant funding. I helped to organize an annual fund rasing activity and establish budgeting guidelines. We served over 150 lunch meals each day and provided a 3 day food basket to 30 families each day.
